name: Identified Hostile
description:
Hello, this is a tech demo for the Second-Person Jam, where participants were tasked with creating a game from the second-person perspective.

The game is simple, you're a ship trying to last as long as possible while avoiding a hostile ship and obstacles. The twist? You see through the hostile ship. Also, make sure not to go too far out of the planets, or you'll die.

Controls are also simple. Move the ship with WASD and reset the demo with R.

This was pretty fun to make. I'll link a video with the details if you'd like to see how I did it.

Enjoy!
